artist: Artist: Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: sailboats on water at right; two men fishing on small peninsula at center, with rising sun on horizon; large tree left of center; man pushing off on boat in LLC, with two men on top of berm at left; ladder from shore to top of berm at left
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom, printed in black: [Dessiné et gravé par P.J. Loutherbourg.  Le Matin  Troisieme Suite. / Se vend chez l\'Auteur, rue du Bacq à coté des Missionaires Etrangers.]; on back, in brown ink: [No 1]
portfolio: From Les Quatre Heures du Jour
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1999; sold set of four prints in July for PROO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le Matin, from "Les Quatre Heures du Jour"
